eventName: So Long, Adele: Home Away From Home
storyInfo: Bidding opens on the Siestan Fashion Street and unfinished plate rebuilding project. Bison and Swire trade verbal blows in the negotiations. Eyjafjalla makes unexpected friends, including Kahn, her mother's former student, and a strange creature that can talk.

attributes.content: ...In response to increasing volcanic activity since 1097, Mayor Herman Doykos initiated the Siesta Free State Relocation Project.
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: By early 1099, more than 90% of Siestans are expected to leave the volcanos and beaches for a new life in a nomadic city.
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: Just to make it clear, girl, you only paid enough to get you to the next hub. You'll have to find your own way from there.
attributes.name: Truck Driver

attributes.content: ...I will.
attributes.name: Quiet Girl

attributes.content: You say that, but have you any idea how dangerous the barrens are? It's no place for a kid like you.
attributes.name: Truck Driver

attributes.content: Why are you going to Siesta, anyway? Chasing your favorite band?
attributes.name: Truck Driver

attributes.content: Work.
attributes.name: Quiet Girl

attributes.content: Going from Columbia to Siesta to look for work? You must've been living under a rock for the last 70 years.
attributes.name: Truck Driver

attributes.content: There was a time when people flocked there to make their fortune. They say you could bend down and pick up some obsidian anywhere on the volcano.
attributes.name: Truck Driver

attributes.content: But Columbia is where opportunities are these days.
attributes.name: Truck Driver

attributes.content: I interned at a construction company before I graduated. There was a serious accident just as my internship was about to end, and the company blamed it all on me.
attributes.name: Quiet Girl

attributes.content: With that on my record, the only job I could find was some tiny demolition operation, where I got Oripathy from the way they misused Originium bomb.
attributes.name: Quiet Girl

attributes.content: I wanted to stay in the city, but got scammed out of my last savings paying for medical insurance.
attributes.name: Quiet Girl

attributes.content: Well, that's tough luck.
attributes.name: Truck Driver

attributes.content: Don't let Oripathy stop you from being a pillar of the nation! Join the frontier Pioneers!
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: The Pioneers provide an opportunity for every child of Columbia to have a better future...
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: I thought it was time for a change... my grandfather told me Siesta is a beautiful place.
attributes.name: Quiet Girl

attributes.content: I hope you find better luck there.
attributes.name: Truck Driver

attributes.content: I think I will.
attributes.name: Quiet Girl

attributes.content: I've lost my way♪
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: I've lost the path♪
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: Static overcomes the easy tune that was playing on the car radio.
The truck slows to a halt on the barrens, as though all life was sucked out of it.
What the heck is going on?
attributes.name: Truck Driver

attributes.content: One more dessert of the day, please!
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Of course! Would you like to try a different flavor?
attributes.name: Stylish Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Prices here are nothing like Columbia... it's a tourist town alright.
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: All the food looks so nice... the cocktails too...
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: All original. Can't get them anywhere else.
attributes.name: Stylish Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Every cocktail has a story. Like this Nutmeg Beach...
attributes.name: Stylish Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Hey—
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Are those two friends of yours?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Yeah, we're all from Lungmen, and we work for the same company. We get along really well.
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: But why do they look like they could break into a fistfight at any time?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Even good friends fight sometimes...
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Didn't expect you to grace us with your presence personally, Commissioner Swire.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: The L.G.D. has annual leave. Got a problem with that?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I know why you're here.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: I have to say, I was surprised to see you and your family on the list of bidders for the new plate and shopping district rebuilding project.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: *Cough* *Cough*—
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Mr. Enis! A-Are you ok?
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Just got a fright... I mean, I choked on something...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Well, MountainDash Logistics's activities in Siesta are no news to me. You want to set up a logistics hub at this plate because of its location. Where's Eurill?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I'm in charge of this project.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Mountaincomm Trade may be a subsidiary of MountainDash Logistics, but I'm not relying on MountainDash's resources at all.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: This boy born with a silver spoon in his mouth says he doesn't rely on his family's resources. Did you bike here?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: This is no time or place for jokes, Miss Swire.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Very well, we'll talk business.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: This is a project with a lot of potential, a lot of eyes on it, including my own.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: It's fair game so long as MountainDash Logistics doesn't have a formal contract with Siesta.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Then may I ask your plans for the district?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Let's call those a business secret.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Shopping center or ski resort, anything with some economic benefit has a reason to be part of the bidding.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I think I saw some engineered lava hot springs on the way here? That seems pretty interesting. Maybe I should rebuild this whole area as a hot spring resort.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: This is serious. Let's talk seriously.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: I know your family is a linchpin of the Lungmen economy, and you've contributed much to the city's development.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: But the project in this area of New Siesta isn't just a commercial venture. It has to take into account the city's long-term development, and the livelihoods of the people here.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: I'll ask you to rethink, if you're just in this for fun...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Mr. Bison, sir.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: If you're really confident in your proposal, then all you need to do is to outbid me fair and square. Why did you feel the need to come to me here?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: MountainDash's efforts at establishing a large-scale international trade network are innovative, but innovation entails risk.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Why are your methods more correct than mine, when they both involve business and profit?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: If you insist on continuing this pointless competition... I will play your game.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: And I'm happy to play. We have some time until the official bidding starts. We'll each play our hands until then.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: What are you looking at, Snowsant?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Miss Swire! Something is not right with the route that gentleman took when he drove us here. There's no way this was ten kilometers.
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: There are greedy people everywhere... where did you get this map?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I said I wanted to borrow a map to look up some sightseeing routes, and Mr. Enis gave this to me. He says it's a commemorative edition issued for Siesta's relocation.
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: And so he charged me some more gold certificates...
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: The map is creased, with a few barely legible routes on it, and childish scribblings for the sea and volcanoes.
This map's being handed out for free at the city entrance.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: (Look of surprise)
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: I'll teach him a lesson, next time I see him.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Hum hum♪
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Enis! You're in a good mood. Swindled another new visitor? Someone's gonna beat you up one of these days.
attributes.name: Relaxed Customer

attributes.content: I wasn't ripping off some poor shmoe. These folks, my friend, were filthy rich.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: She was talking big business with that guy from the trade company, hoping to make god knows how much money. Call it a little deductible on behalf of the citizens of Siesta.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Let's go!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Is it this one?
attributes.name: Curious Girl

attributes.content: No, look at the shape. It has three peaks, the one in the photo only has two.
attributes.name: Curious Boy

attributes.content: Let's keep looking.
attributes.name: Curious Boy

attributes.content: Volcano Watchers? I've seen these plants in my mother's notes.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: There's a Siestan legend about flowers that change color based on volcanic activity. Katia and Magna came looking for it the first time they were here.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: There were reports of massive blooms on the slopes before every recorded volcanic activity on Mount Siesta, a beautiful warning of danger.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Did the flowers go extinct?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: The flowers are just a legend. There's no proof that they ever existed, and this word-of-mouth stuff gives us little to work with.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: It would make sense for Originium activity to affect nearby plants.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Would finding this flower provide another way to prevent volcanic disasters?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Perhaps, but I've never heard of it growing anywhere else.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: That's the way Siesta is. There are many legends here; who knows how many were made up just to attract tourists.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Pink clouds on a sunny day, white cliffs by the mouth of a volcano... many people come seeking these legendary sights every year.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: I remember you met my parents in Siesta, Professor Keller?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: ...Yes, I did.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: They said they came to Siesta to survey the volcanoes, and ran into a geology student writing her thesis in one of the cafes.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: So they brought her with them when they climbed the volcano.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: I didn't specialize in volcanoes at the time... it was my first time climbing that one. A beautiful sight, it delayed my thesis.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Mutti and Vati were always reminiscing about that time.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: I want to hear more stories about them. Can you tell me more?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: The scholar gazes away, towards the stack of documents in her hand. The air of recollection is quickly diluted by the labors of reality.
Now is not the time to chat. Let's focus on our work.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Professor Keller.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Is the city council meeting over?
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: There is increasing public opposition to moving away from the current beachfront. The city council is keen to have an accurate estimation of when the volcano will erupt, and wants us to provide a guarantee for the estimate that we gave.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: I rejected it on the spot as being impossible and irresponsible. We try to give an estimate that is as accurate as possible, but scientific survey cannot be held responsible for the government's opinion polls.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Thank you for taking care of that, Dr. Kahn.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: No need to thank me. The volcano museum is your project, and I promised to help so you could focus on more important things.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: This is something that matters to all volcanologists, and I hope—
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: ...Adele?
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Kahn!
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: I forgot. Of course you knew each other.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: ...Of course.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Is she here at your behest?
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: The museum's collection includes Mr. and Mrs. Naumann's research, and the eruption of Mount Siesta is a rare opportunity. I wanted to respect Adele's wishes...
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: I just didn't think it was the kind of work that needed to recruit a sickly... someone who's not in the best of health.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: I came to help out while on vacation. It's not really a bother...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Kahn has a point. Your health is important. You have to take it easy, Adele.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Let's call it a day. May I ask you to bring Adele back to her accommodations, Dr. Kahn?
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: ...Of course.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Have a cocktail on me! Reward for fetching a rare new customer.
attributes.name: Stylish Shopkeeper

attributes.content: You just wanted someone to test it for poison...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: I call it 'Cotton Sunset'. How is it?
attributes.name: Stylish Shopkeeper

attributes.content: It has a... er... 'unique' flavor.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: You're one tough customer.
attributes.name: Stylish Shopkeeper

attributes.content: So, was that girl a friend of yours?
attributes.name: Stylish Shopkeeper

attributes.content: She... forget it, I haven't got the nerve to befriend her.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Shame.
attributes.name: Stylish Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Truck driver, Messenger, ticket seller, swimming coach... how many jobs are you working?
attributes.name: Stylish Shopkeeper

attributes.content: It's the high season, after all. Got to seize the opportunity.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: What do you need money for? Got a girl you fancy?
attributes.name: Stylish Shopkeeper

attributes.content: I could give you an advance on your wages, if you're running short on pocket money.
attributes.name: Stylish Shopkeeper

attributes.content: I don't—
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Forget it... seeing how business has been these few months, I should feel lucky that I even get my meals. You should be worrying about dorm fees for the little ones.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Hah, this is nothing compared to the stuff I've seen in the past.
attributes.name: Stylish Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Are you going to tell that story about how you led a protest against the local magnate in Kazimierz through rock music, then went on to a career in Siesta's rock n' roll scene, finally settling down here with this bar? Again?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Good memory on you.
attributes.name: Stylish Shopkeeper

attributes.content: I'm too old for bedtime stories.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Say, there's something I've been meaning to talk to you about.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Business hasn't been great since last year. I heard things have been going well at the engineered lava hot springs. If we...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Getting funny ideas again, young man?
attributes.name: Stylish Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Don't get ahead of yourself. I'm still the owner of this place on paper. You haven't taken over yet.
attributes.name: Stylish Shopkeeper

attributes.content: This is the coolest cocktail bar in Siesta, and it hasn't changed one bit from Old Siesta to New Siesta. I'm not about to abandon it over a few slow months.
attributes.name: Stylish Shopkeeper

attributes.content: This isn't a short-term thing... city council people have been here a few times. The whole street could be demolished.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Yet you fixed the sign for the folks next door, while you haven't bothered to fix ours, even though it's been broken for days.
attributes.name: Stylish Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Is a sign going to save the shop?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Stop worrying about troubles that aren't even here yet. Life isn't nearly as bad as you think.
attributes.name: Stylish Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Act your age for once. Leave the worrying to the old folks.
attributes.name: Stylish Shopkeeper

attributes.content: I want to travel a little once the high season is over.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Sure. Columbia? Victoria?
attributes.name: Stylish Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Or even further away, just like him. See the world, expand your horizons.
attributes.name: Stylish Shopkeeper

attributes.content: You're too young to be worrying about the little things.
attributes.name: Stylish Shopkeeper

attributes.content: What I mean is... I could be gone for a while.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: What's this about?
attributes.name: Stylish Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Oh, I had a little bump while moving some stuff. I thought it was nothing.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Well, the summer is pretty dry this year. You should have more fruits and veggies. Need a recipe from me?
attributes.name: Stylish Shopkeeper

attributes.content: I'm not a kid anymore...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Then don't make me have to worry about you. Look the part, if you want to be taking care of other people.
attributes.name: Stylish Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Alright, Mom.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Thanks for the escort, Kahn.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: I'm sure you have a lot of work to do. I'll be fine the rest of the way.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Sorry, could you speak up a little? It's noisy out here and I couldn't quite hear you.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Are you worried about me? Don't be, everyday life isn't much trouble anymore.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: I didn't think I would see you in Siesta... are you okay?
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Your disease...
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Well, the Oripathy getting worse can't be helped... but things are largely under control now.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: I have to wear a hearing aid and glasses, but I'm getting used to it. I've also gotten pretty good at lip reading!
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: It's just so unfair... a girl as young as you.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: It's not about fair.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: I've seen plenty of Infected at Rhodes Island. Many are even younger than I am. Some are little kids who hardly know what's going on. None of them know when their lives will end.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: At least I have a clear goal, and I'm still strong enough to work towards it. I'm one of the lucky ones.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Has it really been so long since you went to Rhodes Island? How time flies... I heard you're still surveying volcanos in person, and even more frequently these days.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: That's... it's dangerous, Adele.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: I've talked to the physicians at Rhodes Island. I know how much time I have left...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: But there's so much still to do... I can't let my parents' research end like this.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: You don't have to be the one to do it. Not in your... condition.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: What else can I do, though?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Kahn, I... I miss them...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Poor girl. Do you not suffer enough shackles already?
What? I wouldn't call it shackles...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: What's that you just said, Adele?
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: I... huh?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Adele... I studied with Dr. Naumann for many years.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: She was my greatest mentor. She brought me out of that little backwater, and took me down the path of science.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: She changed my life. I don't know where I would be without her. I could never repay her kindness.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Mutti always said you were her best student.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Kahn pauses, as though to muster courage.
I just can't accept the mysterious circumstances surrounding their deaths.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: The night breeze carries with it the sound of guitar.
Street lamps begin to light up, forming a line that leads to the 'volcano' at the center of the city. Mist rises from hot springs in the distance, laying a veil over the night sky.
Adele rubs her eyes.
You didn't see your parents the year before they died, did you?
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: They were always busy, practically living out of their lab at the university. I wasn't even allowed to visit them.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Did something happen?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: As a scientist, I know how inappropriate it is to operate off a biased conjecture. And yet, I can't help but suspect...
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: My, my, another one with an obsession.
What...?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: I don't trust Keller, Adele. Be careful.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: I don't understand. Why do humans talk so much about things they have never seen? Why to they pretend to have more wisdom than they possess?
I didn't quite hear what you said... might be a problem with my hearing aid...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Sorry, I got excited. It's been a long time since I last saw you.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: It's late. You should get some rest.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: ...See you.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: What was Kahn going to say?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Girl? Girl?
Ahem. Hey, can you hear me?
Is someone calling me?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Hello?
